content.eamr: ( ing-0 "1 (8.5 ounce) package corn bread/muffin mix" )
( ing-5 "1 (26 ounce) jar meatless spaghetti sauce" )

content.text: 1 (4 ounce) can chopped green chilies, drained
content.eamr: ( ing-7 "1 (4 ounce) can chopped green chilies, drained" )
( ing-8 "2 (1.3 ounce) envelopes sloppy joe mix" )

content.text: 0) Prepare and bake corn bread according to package directions, using the egg and milk.
1) Meanwhile, in a large skillet, cook beef and onion over medium heat until meat is no longer pink; drain.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "cook"@34:38 / AC
		:loc ( tool-1-0 "a large skillet"@17:32 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "beef"@39:43 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "onion"@48:53 / FOOD )
		:heat ( temp-1-0 "medium heat"@59:70 / TEMPERATURE )
		:until ( cond-1-0 "until meat is no longer pink"@71:99 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
	:inform ( ac-1-1 "drain"@101:106 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Stir in the spaghetti sauce, corn, chilies and sloppy joe mix.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-5 "the spaghetti sauce"@11:30 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "corn"@32:36 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "chilies"@38:45 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "sloppy joe mix"@50:64 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Reduce heat; simmer, uncovered, for 10 minutes.
5) Sprinkle with cheese; cover and cook for 1 minute or until cheese is melted.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Sprinkle"@3:11 / AC
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-9 "cheese"@17:23 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-5-1 "cover"@25:30 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-5-2 "cook"@35:39 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-5-0 "1 minute"@44:52 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-5-0 "until cheese is melted"@56:78 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Cut corn bread into six pieces; cut each piece in half.
